body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting PixelPerfect Studios. My name is Jerry Hernandez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jerry, I'm Linda Ward. I'm calling about an issue I'm having with the shipping of an order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Linda. I'm sorry to hear you're having issues. Can you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's P one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Linda. I'll look up your order now. Also, for verification purposes, can I have the date of your birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's June sixth, one nine eight four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for that information. To help you better, could you please share the email address associated with this order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks Linda. I've located your order, and I'm seeing the issue. It appears there was a delay with the shipping company. I’m going to expedite this and you'll receive your package within the next two days.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Jerry! Thank you so much for your help. I'm feeling relieved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Linda! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything. Thank you, Jerry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: My pleasure, Linda. Thank you for calling PixelPerfect Studios. Have a great day!
